# billingContact

**Instance Property**

A prepopulated billing address.

## Declaration

```swift
var billingContact: PKContact? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you have an up-to-date billing address on file, you can set it here. This billing address appears in the payment sheet. The user can either use the address you specify or select a different address.

Note that a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKContact] object that represents a billing contact contains information for only the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKContact/postalAddress] property. All other properties in the object are set to `nil`.

## Providing known contact information

- **shippingContact**: A prepopulated shipping address.
- **PKContact**: An object that encapsulates contact information needed for billing and shipping.
